discussion.content: It's A and B. While D can be visualized within Marketing Cloud Email Studio, it cannot be EXPORTED, which is what this question is asking for.
Answer is A and B

questions.question_text:
A national public university distributed a newsletter to alumni, students, faculty, and prospective students. The university's marketing team wants to see the results of the email campaign.
Which two items of information and data about the performance of an individual send can be exported from Tracking in Email Studio? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Images showing how the email rendered on different devices
choices.C: Number of clicks from mobile devices
choices.A: Subscribers who click on a specific link
choices.B: Performance data on the Overview tab

choices.C: Limit the email text to 250 words.
choices.B: Send to the entire subscriber base.

questions.question_text:
A marketer at Northern Trail Outfitters must design a targeted email campaign for the company's new winter offerings.
What email best practice should be used?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Personalize the email content.
Personalizing the email content is a best practice in email marketing. By using personalization, you can tailor the content of the email to each individual subscriber based on their preferences, behavior, or demographic information. Personalized emails are more relevant to the recipients, which can lead to higher engagement and conversion rates. For a targeted email campaign promoting new winter offerings, personalization could include using the subscriber's name, recommending products based on past purchases or browsing history, and customizing content based on their location or preferences related to winter products.


Option B, "Send to the entire subscriber base," is not a best practice in email marketing when it comes to targeted email campaigns. Sending emails to the entire subscriber base without proper segmentation can lead to sending irrelevant content to some subscribers, resulting in lower engagement and potentially higher unsubscribe rates.
It’s not B because it’s targeted email campaign.. should be send to targeted audience with personalized content.
Why not B ?

choices.B: Keep total weight with images at 800KB or lower.
choices.A: Use one file type for all images in the email.
choices.C: Increase DPI and file size for image display.
choices.D: Rely on image-only emails to engage subscribers.

discussion.content: Use one file type for all images in the email.

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to ensure a good user experience when subscribers read their emails.
What best practice should be employed?

choices.C: If the Customer_ID field does not exist on the All Subscribers List, the email send will fail.
choices.A: The email address and Subscriber Key will be added to the All Subscribers List.
choices.D: The subscriber will be added to the All Subscribers List with a status of Active.
choices.B: The Primary Key and demographic data will be added to the All Subscribers List.

discussion.content: AD is answer. Upon creation of the record in the All Subscribers, the subscriber’s status is typically set to Active by default.
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000388210&type=1
Correct ans is CD

choices.B: Select the IT users from the Notification Settings panel on the Overview page in Automation Studio.
choices.A: Navigate to the Automation's Activity tab and enter a comma delimited list of IT staff in the Run Completion field.
choices.D: Select and configure the Automation Studio Completion report from the Reports Catalog within the Reports application.
choices.C: Add a Send Email Activity to the end of the Automation workflow and configure it to send to a Subscriber list of IT staff.
